name: TheLordoftheRingsTriviaGame
0:
”Alexa, play The Lord of the Rings Trivia Game”
”Repeat”
”The answer is 1”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the lord of the rings trivia game
des:
The Lord of the Rings Trivia Game for The Lord of the Rings and other works by J.R.R. Tolkien. 

The trivia knowledge bank ranges from "I've watched the movies" to "I name my pets after the High Elves." The trivia covers both the movies and the books, but is true to the books.

Gameplay:

To get started, simply say, "Alexa, play The Lord of the Rings Trivia Game."

Listen carefully for the most correct answer!

To give an answer to a question, respond with the number of the answer. For example, say one, two, three, or four.

To repeat the last question, say, "Repeat."

If you don't know the answer, you can also respond with, "I don't know."

To start a new game at any time, say, "Start a new game."

More trivia questions added regularly!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
